name: LD51-10 Frame Adventure
description:
Our **hero** is trapped in the map,

Try to reach the end in a constantly changing map.

The map has a total of 10 frames, and the content of each frame is different.

Come on, get to the finish line.

## How to play

- Left/Right + Z

- A/D + J

- R to restart.

## Level Generator

I spent most of my time on the level generator, be sure to try customizing a level to play.

- You can create custom levels.

- You can copy custom levels to the clipboard and reply to comments.

- You can paste the copied level into the level creator to play.

### Level Generator Usage
